item.title: Google upgrades its programming agent Code Assist with Gemini 2.0, adds source integrations
item.description: Google's enterprise-focused Code Assist will now be powered by Gemini 2.0 and connect to tools like Atlassian, GitHub and GitLab.

item.title: Nvidia and DataStax just made generative AI smarter and leaner — here’s how

item.title: Writer’s new AI model aims to fix the ‘sameness problem’ in generative content

item.title: Engineered Arts restructures with $10M to create humanoid robots
item.description: Engineered Arts, a United Kingdom firm making humanoid robots, has restructured as a U.S. company and raised $10 million.

item.title: Google: AI agents, multimodal AI, enterprise search will dominate in 2025
item.description: Google used NotebookLM, Google Trends and third-party insights to identify AI agents, multimodal AI and enterprise search as top 2025 trends.
